game.name: Cube Xtreme
game.description:
The cube is in a search for a helping hand who could help it reach to the end of the track. However, the problem is that there are a large number of gaps and sharp spikes you will see on the platform. Begin this brand new adventure game with clicking the big start button! Try to keep your cube running while avoid falling into unwanted gaps! You also have to take care of avoiding touch with sharp spikes. Use your focus and quick reaction skills to keep the cube safe!

Your primary role in this free online platform game is to get the little cube get to the end of these obstacles-filled tracks. Do you think that are you are the right candidate for this job? Join Cube Xtreme and help the little cube reach at the destination point safely! Make sure to run the cube over the dangerous ledges and allow it make a right jump to protect it from falling. Try to avoid landing on any deadly triangles and clear as many level as possible!

Cube Xtreme is a free online HTML5 cube runner game, which is quite simple and challenging. Guide the cube for the right path while avoiding red obstacles and grabbing green colour gems to upgrade. With 27 beautifully-designed levels, you have to concentrate on running as far as you can. Enjoy this incredible arcade game with your friends in two games mode! Touch the right screen to rotate your cube at right side (clockwise) and the left screen to rotate your cube at left side (anticlockwise).
